TopicTitle: Armed UNSC Sabres With Currently Prototype Missiles

Articles.Content:
OFFICE OF NAVAL INTELLIGENCE/SECTION 3

EYES ONLY REPORT - A340021

0821 HOURS, AUGUST 12, 2552

CLASSIFIED TOP-SECRET

COMM-SCRIBED/PTS 9386-9

00834-19223-HS//ADM PARANGOSKY, MARGRET OLIANDA

00230-00923-MP//VADM STANFORTH, HIRONYMOUS MICHAEL

RE: OPERATION: FALLING STAR

To fight those dastardly Insurrectionists, we are fielding some new pieces of equipment. Two fighters, to be exact. Any attempts to leak these fighters will result in immediate charges of treason and execution without trial.

That is one glorious flag! How much time did it take to make it?
